cards.prompt:
A vertical premium collectible card in 3:4 aspect ratio, styled as a "SIBLING DUALITY" card for the Torah Titans series.

=== DESIGN INSPIRATION ===
YIN-YANG SYMBOL and COSMIC DUALITY: Two interlocking forces that define each other. Taoist balance, Mesoamerican twin mythology, the idea that opposites are interconnected and contain seeds of each other.

=== CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS ===
1. TWO BIBLICAL FIGURES in interlocking CIRCULAR composition (yin-yang inspired)
2. High contrast design: one half light, one half dark
3. Each figure CURVED around the other, creating the flowing S-curve
4. Classical artistic interpretation with cosmic/philosophical undertones
5. Each figure must have exactly TWO ARMS
6. This is STYLIZED ART for a collectible card, not a photograph

=== RIVALRY CONTEXT ===
The rivalry between Jacob and Esau

=== DUALITY COMPOSITION ===
The card features a LARGE CIRCULAR YIN-YANG-INSPIRED design:

The central composition is a circle divided by a flowing S-CURVE:

JACOB DOMAIN (upper-left):
- Background: warm gold/amber tones, representing light/fire
- Figure: Curved/flowing pose that follows the S-curve border
- Contains a small circular "seed" of Esau's color (yin-yang dot)
- smooth skin, voice of wisdom, quiet contemplation

ESAU DOMAIN (lower-right):
- Background: deep black/indigo tones, representing shadow/water
- Figure: Curved/flowing pose that follows the S-curve border
- Contains a small circular "seed" of Jacob's color (yin-yang dot)
- rough/hairy, physicality, action and instinct

The S-CURVE where they meet is the point of maximum tension and connection - their backs curved toward each other, or hands almost touching across the divide.

=== FIGURE DESCRIPTIONS ===

JACOB (LIGHT/FIRE SIDE):
- Physical: smooth-skinned man (contrast to hairy Esau), intelligent scheming eyes, neat beard, calculating expression, olive skin, always thinking three moves ahead
- Wearing: wealthy patriarch's robes, layered fine fabrics, the dress of a successful man who earned it through wit in warm gold/amber tones
- Pose: Curved, flowing position following the circular composition
- Body curves along the S-divider, like half of the yin-yang symbol
- Displaying: shepherd's staff, surrounded by spotted and speckled sheep and goats representing his clever dealings with Laban
- Style: Elegant, cosmic, slightly ethereal
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only

ESAU (SHADOW/WATER SIDE):
- Physical: EXTREMELY HAIRY man covered in red hair all over body and arms (as described in Genesis), wild rugged appearance, powerful hunter's build, ruddy red complexion, fierce untamed eyes, lives by instinct
- Wearing: rough animal skins and furs, minimal clothing of a man who lives outdoors, leather straps and hunting gear in deep black/indigo tones
- Pose: Curved, flowing position following the circular composition
- Body curves along the S-divider, mirroring Jacob's curve
- Displaying: powerful hunting bow, freshly caught wild game slung over shoulder, tools of the wild hunter
- Style: Powerful, cosmic, slightly ethereal
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only, may carry bow

=== THE "SEEDS" (YIN-YANG DOTS) ===
Critical element: Each half contains a small circle of the OPPOSITE color:
- In Jacob's domain: A small deep black/indigo circle containing something of Esau (an eye, a hand, a symbol)
- In Esau's domain: A small warm gold/amber circle containing something of Jacob (an eye, a hand, a symbol)

These "seeds" represent: "born together, destined to struggle, cannot exist without the other"

=== BACKGROUND ===
COSMIC/ELEMENTAL contrast with SYMBOLIC IMAGERY:
- Jacob's half: Gradients of warm gold/amber, smooth transitions
  * TENT silhouettes in the background - the dwelling place of the quiet scholar
  * Torah scrolls, study tables, domestic hearth imagery
  * Stars visible through tent opening (promise of descendants)
  * Peaceful, contemplative atmosphere

- Esau's half: Gradients of deep black/indigo, smooth transitions
  * Open FIELD stretching to horizon - the wild hunting grounds
  * Silhouettes of prey animals (deer, wild game)
  * Bow and arrows, hunting imagery
  * Untamed wilderness, rugged terrain

- The colors blend at the S-curve boundary where tent meets field
- Outer background: Deep cosmic space or subtle gradient vignette

=== CIRCULAR FRAME WITH SCRIPTURE ===
The yin-yang composition should be set within a PROMINENT CIRCLE:
- Clean, bold circular border containing the duality design
- The border ring is wide enough to contain TEXT
- The circle represents completeness - the two halves make a whole

CRITICAL - SCRIPTURE TEXT AROUND THE CIRCLE:
The circular border contains ACTUAL SCRIPTURE TEXT arcing around it:

UPPER ARC (above the yin-yang, curving with the circle):
Hebrew text: "עֵשָׂו אִישׁ יֹדֵעַ צַיִד אִישׁ שָׂדֶה וְיַעֲקֹב אִישׁ תָּם יֹשֵׁב אֹהָלִים"
- Gold or light-colored text on the border
- Elegant Hebrew typography, readable
- Arcs along the TOP half of the circle from left to right

LOWER ARC (below the yin-yang, curving with the circle):
English text: "Esau was a hunter, a man of the field; Jacob was a quiet man, dwelling in tents"
- Matching gold or light-colored text
- Clean serif typography
- Arcs along the BOTTOM half of the circle
- Source "Genesis 25:27" may appear in small text

The scripture creates a frame of meaning around the cosmic duality.

=== BORDER & FRAME ===
Modern, clean border with cosmic undertones:
- Dark outer border (deep blue, purple, or black)
- Subtle starfield or gradient effect
- The central circle with its scripture border is the hero of the composition
- Minimal additional decoration to let the duality and scripture speak

=== TEXT ELEMENTS (render exactly as specified) ===
TOP: "TORAH TITANS" in clean, modern serif font with subtle metallic sheen
- Centered above the circular composition
- Balanced, understated typography

SUBTITLE: "Sibling Duality" in elegant script or small caps below

BOTTOM: "Jacob & Esau" in balanced text
- Positioned below the circle
- May use " / " or "&" to connect the names

=== COLOR RELATIONSHIPS ===
Suggested color pairs (use what fits the specific pairing):
- Gold/Amber vs Black/Indigo (light vs dark)
- Fire orange/red vs Water blue/teal (fire vs water)
- Day gold/white vs Night blue/black (day vs night)
- Warm earth tones vs Cool sky tones (earth vs sky)

The key is HIGH CONTRAST while maintaining visual harmony.

=== FINISH ===
Smooth, cosmic aesthetic:
- Clean gradients without harsh edges
- Subtle metallic or iridescent sheen on the circular border
- Colors flow and blend beautifully
- Premium collectible card with philosophical depth
- Mood: "Opposites define each other", "Cannot exist without the other", "Two halves of one whole"

A vertical premium collectible card in 3:4 aspect ratio, styled as a "SIBLING ICON" for the Torah Titans series.

=== DESIGN INSPIRATION ===
BYZANTINE RELIGIOUS ART: Gold-ground mosaics, illuminated manuscripts, hinged altar diptychs, Orthodox icons. Sacred, timeless, divine judgment rendered in art.

=== CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS ===
1. TWO BIBLICAL FIGURES in formal icon poses, side by side like a diptych
2. Byzantine mosaic aesthetic with gold leaf and tesserae texture
3. Classical religious icon style - formal, frontal or three-quarter poses
4. Each figure must have exactly TWO ARMS
5. This is STYLIZED ART for a collectible card, not a photograph

=== RIVALRY CONTEXT ===
The rivalry between Jacob and Esau

=== DIPTYCH COMPOSITION ===
The card is divided into TWO PANELS like a hinged religious diptych:

LEFT PANEL: JACOB
- Standing or seated in formal Byzantine icon pose
- Facing slightly toward center (three-quarter view) or directly at viewer
- Holding: shepherd's staff, surrounded by spotted and speckled sheep and goats representing his clever dealings with Laban as a sacred symbol
- No halo

RIGHT PANEL: ESAU
- Standing or seated in formal Byzantine icon pose
- Facing slightly toward center (three-quarter view) or directly at viewer
- Holding: powerful hunting bow, freshly caught wild game slung over shoulder, tools of the wild hunter as a sacred symbol
- No halo

=== FIGURE DESCRIPTIONS ===

JACOB (LEFT PANEL):
- Physical: smooth-skinned man (contrast to hairy Esau), intelligent scheming eyes, neat beard, calculating expression, olive skin, always thinking three moves ahead
- Wearing: wealthy patriarch's robes, layered fine fabrics, the dress of a successful man who earned it through wit - rendered in Byzantine style with gold trim and geometric folds
- Style: Byzantine icon - formal, dignified, stylized rather than realistic
- Expression: Solemn, timeless, characteristic of the figure
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only

ESAU (RIGHT PANEL):
- Physical: EXTREMELY HAIRY man covered in red hair all over body and arms (as described in Genesis), wild rugged appearance, powerful hunter's build, ruddy red complexion, fierce untamed eyes, lives by instinct
- Wearing: rough animal skins and furs, minimal clothing of a man who lives outdoors, leather straps and hunting gear - rendered in Byzantine style with rich colors and gold details
- Style: Byzantine icon - formal, dignified, stylized rather than realistic
- Expression: Solemn, timeless, characteristic of the figure
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only, may carry bow

=== CENTER DIVIDER (HINGE) ===
An ornate DECORATIVE HINGE or BORDER runs vertically between the two panels:
- Style: Jeweled metalwork like an icon frame
- Features: Geometric patterns, gemstones (ruby, sapphire, emerald)
- Width: Thin but prominent, suggesting the hinge of a real diptych
- May contain small Hebrew letters or biblical symbols

=== BACKGROUND ===
Byzantine GOLD LEAF background for both panels:
- Rich, burnished gold leaf covering the background
- Subtle MOSAIC TESSERAE TEXTURE (small tile pattern visible)
- May include subtle geometric or floral patterns in the gold
- Each panel has its own gold ground
- NO realistic landscape - pure gold icon background

The gold creates a sense of divine, timeless space.

=== BORDER & FRAME ===
Ornate JEWELED ICON FRAME surrounding the entire card:
- Deep blue, crimson, or purple base
- Gold filigree patterns
- Corner medallions with gemstones
- Inner beaded border (like Byzantine metalwork)
- Frame suggests a precious reliquary or icon cover

=== TEXT ELEMENTS (render exactly as specified) ===
TOP: "TORAH TITANS" in Byzantine-style lettering (like Greek uncials or manuscript text)
- Gold letters on dark band
- Formal, sacred typography

SUBTITLE: "Sibling Icon" in smaller elegant script below

LEFT PANEL: "Jacob" in gold lettering at bottom of panel
- Byzantine manuscript style lettering
- May include Hebrew characters

RIGHT PANEL: "Esau" in gold lettering at bottom of panel
- Matching style to left panel
- May include Hebrew characters

=== ADDITIONAL BYZANTINE ELEMENTS ===
- Greek-style drapery folds (geometric, stylized)
- Gold highlights on clothing and objects
- Possible small religious symbols (stars, crosses, menorahs) in background
- Craquelure or aged patina texture suggesting ancient icon
- Deep, rich colors: crimson, royal blue, purple, forest green, gold

=== FINISH ===
Aged gold leaf with mosaic texture:
- Warm, burnished gold appearance
- Visible tesserae (mosaic tile) pattern
- Subtle craquelure (fine cracks like old paintings)
- Jewel-toned accents catch light
- Premium collectible card feel with sacred gravitas
- Mood: "Divine judgment rendered", "Sacred, timeless, eternal"

A vertical premium collectible card in 3:4 aspect ratio, styled as a "SIBLING CARD" for the Torah Titans series.

=== DESIGN INSPIRATION ===
18th-century REVERSIBLE PLAYING CARDS (court cards like Kings, Queens, Jacks) where the figure is mirrored and ROTATED 180 DEGREES, so the card looks the same upside-down.

=== CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS ===
1. TWO BIBLICAL FIGURES in ROTATIONAL SYMMETRY - one upright, one inverted
2. The card should look nearly identical when rotated 180 degrees
3. Ornate playing card aesthetic with warm parchment and gold tones
4. Classical artistic interpretation, period accurate
5. Each figure must have exactly TWO ARMS
6. This is STYLIZED ART for a collectible card, not a photograph

=== RIVALRY CONTEXT ===
The rivalry between Jacob and Esau

=== ROTATIONAL COMPOSITION ===
CRITICAL: This is a REVERSIBLE CARD design like classic court cards.

TOP HALF (normal orientation):
JACOB - shown from chest/waist up, RIGHT-SIDE UP
- Head at top of card
- Upper body visible, lower body fades into the center divider
- Holding/displaying: shepherd's staff, surrounded by spotted and speckled sheep and goats representing his clever dealings with Laban

BOTTOM HALF (inverted orientation):
ESAU - shown from chest/waist up, UPSIDE DOWN (rotated 180°)
- Head at bottom of card (appears at top when card is flipped)
- Upper body visible, lower body fades into the center divider
- Holding/displaying: powerful hunting bow, freshly caught wild game slung over shoulder, tools of the wild hunter

The two figures are MIRROR IMAGES of each other, meeting at the center of the card where their bodies merge into the decorative band.

=== FIGURE DESCRIPTIONS ===

JACOB (TOP, UPRIGHT):
- Physical: smooth-skinned man (contrast to hairy Esau), intelligent scheming eyes, neat beard, calculating expression, olive skin, always thinking three moves ahead
- Wearing: wealthy patriarch's robes, layered fine fabrics, the dress of a successful man who earned it through wit
- Style: Playing card court figure aesthetic - stylized, formal, symmetrical pose
- Expression: Dignified, regal, characteristic of the figure
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only

ESAU (BOTTOM, INVERTED):
- Physical: EXTREMELY HAIRY man covered in red hair all over body and arms (as described in Genesis), wild rugged appearance, powerful hunter's build, ruddy red complexion, fierce untamed eyes, lives by instinct
- Wearing: rough animal skins and furs, minimal clothing of a man who lives outdoors, leather straps and hunting gear
- Style: Playing card court figure aesthetic - stylized, formal, symmetrical pose
- Expression: Dignified, regal, characteristic of the figure
- Anatomy: Exactly two arms - two arms only, may carry bow

=== CENTER DIVIDER ===
An ORNATE DECORATIVE BAND runs horizontally across the center of the card where the two figures meet.
- Features: Hebrew letter ש (shin) or other meaningful Hebrew/biblical symbol
- Style: Intricate scrollwork, gold filigree, playing card flourishes
- Width: Approximately 10-15% of card height
- The figures' bodies fade into and emerge from this decorative band

=== BACKGROUND ===
Classic playing card background pattern:
- Warm parchment base with subtle aged texture
- Ornate geometric or floral patterns (like court card backgrounds)
- Rich playing card palette: gold, crimson, royal blue, ivory
- Pattern is SYMMETRICAL when rotated 180 degrees

The background must stay BEHIND the figures - no patterns overlapping faces or key details.

=== BORDER & FRAME ===
Playing card style border:
- Thin gold inner line
- Wider ornate border with corner flourishes
- Corner decorations that mirror when rotated (like court card corners)
- Elegant, gilded playing card frame aesthetic

=== TEXT ELEMENTS (render exactly as specified) ===
TOP EDGE (upright orientation):
- "Jacob" in elegant gold serif font

BOTTOM EDGE (appears at top when card is flipped):
- "Esau" in elegant gold serif font (inverted, readable when card is rotated)

CENTER BAND:
- "TORAH TITANS" in small decorative text integrated into the ornamental band
- "Sibling Card" or relevant subtitle below in elegant script

=== CORNER ELEMENTS ===
Like playing cards, include small corner indices:
- Top-left and bottom-right corners: Symbol or initial for Jacob
- Top-right and bottom-left corners: Symbol or initial for Esau
(Rotational symmetry maintained)

=== FINISH ===
Gilded playing card aesthetic:
- Aged card texture with subtle wear
- Gold metallic accents catch light
- Warm, rich color palette
- Premium collectible card feel with antique elegance
- Mood: "Two sides of the same coin", "Bound by blood"

A vertical premium basketball card in 3:4 aspect ratio, styled after 1996-97 Flair Showcase "Hot Shots" die-cut insert set.

=== CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS ===
1. The basketball player's jersey AND SHORTS must be COMPLETELY BLANK - solid red color only with blue trim, like an unlabeled practice uniform
2. The shorts are PLAIN SOLID RED FABRIC - NO diamond shape, NO logo, NO emblem, NO symbol, NO design whatsoever
3. DO NOT add any team names, NBA logos, Nike swoosh, Jordan logo, or any brand marks
4. DO NOT add any numbers, letters, or symbols to the jersey or shorts
5. All figures must have exactly TWO ARMS
6. This is STYLIZED ART for a collectible card, not a photograph

=== INTERACTION: CUSTOM ACTION ===
Overall: Allen Iverson and Gideon performing their signature moves in parallel
Energy/Mood: powerful, legendary, parallel greatness

ALLEN IVERSON POSE:
executing signature crossover - body extremely LOW to the ground in athletic crouch, explosive lateral shift with weight transferring hard to one side, ball carried low and wide in one hand, upper body leaning into the fake, defender stumbling backwards with ankles broken, cornrows whipping with the explosive change of direction
